vs. Bookmakers: Which Wins?
Differences:
Polymarket: Decentralized, blockchain-based, crypto bets, predicts events (politics, tech, sports).
Bookmakers: Centralized, fiat-focused, sports/casino, locally regulated.
Polymarket Advantages:
More control via smart contracts
High liquidity & transparency
Unique markets
Daily rewards
Limit orders 
I think the choice is obvious, and Polymarket wins.

came with an open mind.
He left with a pit in his stomach, because he confused Israel’s foreign politics with city government.

New York isn’t run by opinions on Israel; it’s run by its mayor and city workers.

And by the way, Jews don’t fight back.
 
We’re loyal citizens wherever we live.

@ZohranKMamdani
